title: Sleep Anxiety Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Sleep Anxiety Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Sleep Anxiety Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 113
items.arabic: ((أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ غَضَبِهِ وَعِقَابِهِ، وَشَرِّ عِبَادِهِ، وَمِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّياطِينِ وَأَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ)).
items.transliteration: aAAoothu bikalimatil-lahit-tammat min ghadabih,waAAiqabih, washarri AAibadih, wamin hamazatish-shayateen, wa-an yahduroon.
items.translation: I take refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His anger and punishment, and from the evil of His servants, and from the madness and appearance of devils.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء النوم
